pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conky is a system monitor that sits in the corner of your desktop. It is a fork of Torsmo that is actually maintained.

use.flag: enable monitoring of music played by media-sound/audacious
enable support for the eve-online skill monitor
enable support for per-task I/O statistics

enable if you want Lua Cairo bindings for Conky (also enables lua support)
enable if you want Lua Imlib2 bindings for Conky (also enables lua and imlib support)
enable support for glibc's libm math library
enable monitoring of music played by media-sound/moc
enable monitoring of music controlled by media-sound/mpd
enable reading of nvidia card temperature sensors via media-video/nvidia-settings
enable support for tcp (ip4) port monitoring

enable support for metar and xoap weather service
enable monitoring of music played by media-sound/xmms2
